entry.title: Python Resources for Beginners
entry.summary:
The following are some resources which I personally used myself when I was learning Python (which I am still learning :) ).

  1. Computational Thinking using Python (this was my first course in python, took it when the cost was INR 3000)
  2. Real Python (one of the best websites on Python that I â€¦
entry.content:
The following are some resources which I personally used myself when I was learning Python (which I am still learning :) ).

  1. Computational Thinking using Python (this was my first course in python, took it when the cost was INR 3000)
  2. Real Python (one of the best websites on Python that I have come across)
  3. Python Official Discord (the OG discord server for Python)
  4. Learn Python
  5. Project Euler (for more algorithmic oriented practice)
  6. My Github Repo (contains cheatsheets for Python and other ML packages)
